CustomField.description: This is required for all applicants. The credit reference must be from either a bank; one of the three credit agencies such as TransUnion, Equifax, or Experian; or a landlord or a service vendor such as a commercial food vendor. *This is not required for public agencies.

CustomField.label: Credit Reference for the Business Entity
